t: Whole Foods Rebrands House Coffee Line, Drops Allegro Name
s: September 9, 2024 - Amazon subsidiary Whole Foods Market this week introduced a rebranding to its core in-house bagged coffee lineup, moving away from the Allegro Coffee name in favor of the Whole Foods name.
